experiences.title: Full-stack Engineer
experiences.summary: Experienced 3 projects, designed, developed, tested websites from scratch with a few member, trained and assisted junior engineers
responsibilities: Designed and created databases and tables
Designed and developed APIs to provide information that front needs
Created web pages using HTML and CSS based on design that are made by Adobe XD
Built infrastructure on AWS with Amplify, Serverless Framework
Designed and developed website from scratch with 2  members for Administrative scriveners. (Part of the website is private to the customers.)
- The private pages for managing what customers inputted what they are going to apply to get a garage certification for customers
- Communication by REST API with Kintone to collect and manage data they inputted
- Reproduce forms that are made by customers on Kintone on the website and send the data that customers inputted on the website to Kintone
Designed and developed private website from scratch with 2 members for membership of a gas company
- Collecting from core system by REST API and displaying information of cost of electricity and gas that customers used
- Displaying graphs information of cost of electricity and gas that customers month by month
- Linking user account on core system to the website
Designed and developed private website from scratch for efficient forklift battery charging
- Displaying predicted schedule of beginning of time to charge battery by predicting system with schedule of planned to use forklift on a day and the past batteries data used
achievements: Trained and assisted junior engineers for a year and they learned how to code, compile, deploy, use libraries, Git, and more. Maintained a good working environment for engineers
Saved time for the company by making scripts to do a job efficiently
Learned Typescript, React.js and Serverless Framework on the job

experiences.title: Full-stack Engineer
experiences.summary: Experienced 6 projects and was responsible for designing, developing, training junior engineer, and managing servers the company has including SSL Certificates.
responsibilities: Designing and developing databases, UI screens and apis
Fixing bugs
Worked as a support team for members of my department:
- Managing servers for ourselves and customers
- Renewing SSL Certificates every year
- Managing user accounts on servers
- Managing mailing lists for ourselves and customers
achievements: Saved time by making script so that I can connect to server by one-password through SSH and switch easily
